HTML.p: When all the team is nearby and ready, your team captain can then begin the Crawl (if no other team is currently crawling). At that time, double-click the Event Master again and you will be presented a button for each template that you can join as. Just press the button and you are taken to the dungeon crawl.

p.u: DON'T FORGET: AssistUO is not compatible with this event, so use Razor!

HTML.p: If you die, come back as your player character and you can double-click again to rejoin (you can switch templates if you want)
You can still the other instructions by saying "help".
